posts.post_content:
this card is only tournament legal because [Painter's Servant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Painter's Servant) is rotating out, even then set her to colorless and your opponent cant play a huge portion of their deck.  
  
this card needs to be banned in all formats. being able to shut down a deck, even for an absurd 9 mana, is unbeatable.  
  
of the mythic rares in this set, i can only see Obsidian Fireheart and Lotus Cobra really being fair.
